revised_title: A New Pharetronid Sponge Discovery from Christmas Island
tldr: The author describes a remarkable pharetronid sponge discovered on Christmas Island. The sponge belongs to a new genus and species and has a unique structure with a rigid main skeleton and a leuconoid canal system. The sponge's classification is discussed, and it is placed in a new sub-family, Murrayoninae, within the Pharetronid family.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Sponge Biology
